description.value:
Your faith is strong enough to briefly summon a direct representative of your deity, such as the deity's herald. The herald occupies the space of a Huge creature and has a Speed of 60 feet. The effects of this spell depend on your deity's alignment.

  • Lawful Good Arrive (enchantment, good, lawful) Aura of Retribution While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Retributive Strike] reaction; Depart Holy Smite The herald casts 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Divine Wrath] (choosing good) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • Neutral Good Arrive (enchantment, good) Aura of Redemption While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Glimpse of Redemption] reaction; Depart Merciful Healing The herald casts the 3-action version of 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Heal] with a radius of 100 feet. This spell targets only you and your allies.
  • Chaotic Good Arrive (chaotic, enchantment, good) Aura of Liberation While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Liberating Step] reaction; Depart Radiating Freedom The herald affects you and all your allies within 100 feet with @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Unfettered Movement]. The duration is reduced to 3 rounds.
  • Lawful Neutral Arrive (abjuration, lawful) Defy Chaos You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against spirit damage while the herald is present; Depart Order's Wrath The herald casts 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Divine Wrath] (choosing lawful) in a 100-foot emanation
  • Neutral Arrive (transmutation) Quickening Ripple You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald are @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Item.Quickened] while the herald is present, and can use the additional action to Step, Stride, or Strike; Depart Sapping Beam The herald casts 6th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Enervation] in a 100-foot line.
  • Chaotic Neutral Arrive (abjuration, chaotic) Defy Law You and each ally within 100 feet of the herald gain resistance 20 against spirit damage while the herald is present; Depart Chaos Hammer The herald casts 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Divine Wrath] (choosing chaotic) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • Lawful Evil Arrive Aura of Iron While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Iron Command] reaction; Depart Unholy Blight The herald casts 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Divine Wrath] (choosing evil) in a 100-foot emanation.
  • Neutral Evil Arrive Aura of Selfishness While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Selfish Shield] reaction; Depart Infinite Despair The herald casts 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Wave of Despair] in a 100-foot cone.
  • Chaotic Evil Arrive Aura of Vengeance While within 100 feet of the herald, you and your allies gain the champion's @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Destructive Vengeance] reaction; Depart Weapon Hurricane The herald casts 5th-rank @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.spells-srd.Item.Weapon Storm] in a 100-foot cone, using d12 for the die size.

duration.value: until the end of your next turn
